content.content: Weekly MIPs Update #86 - May 9, 2022  1479×834 36.3 KB   May’s Ratification Polls are Up and Running   May’s Formal Submission Window closed last Thursday; five proposals entered it and are now on-chain as Ratification Polls. These will run for two weeks and close on May 23.     Proposal Impact Estimation Voting Portal      MIP65: Monetalis Clydesdale: Liquid Bond Strategy & ExecutionForum | MIPs Portal"MIP65 will onboard and activate a RWA vault for the purpose of acquiring USDC via PSM and investing them in high quality liquid bond strategies held by a trust arranged and maintained by Monetalis."    High Go to Voting Page    MIP68: Monetalis Lusitano: UK Green Economy SME Wholesale LendingForum | MIPs Portal"MIP68 is a self-contained collateral onboarding MIP that will onboard and activate a RWA vault backed by the assets of a trust arranged by Monetalis."    High Go to Voting Page    MIP69: L2-to-L1 Fast WithdrawalsForum | MIPs Portal"This MIP formalises technical work completed to deliver Fast Withdrawals on Layer2."    High Go to Voting Page    MIP4c2-SP19: MIP40 Budget Process AmendmentForum | MIPs Portal"For the DAO to grow long-term, it is critical that MKR holders be able to evaluate and compare Budget Proposals with minimum cognitive overhead. Within this revised MIP, Core Units and proposed Core Units are required to submit standardized, transparent, and clear financial information. Budget Proposals must clearly serve a revenue-driving or supporting business purpose in line with the Objectives of the DAO."    Medium Go to Voting Page    MIP40c3-SP67: Modify Core Unit Budget - Strategic Happiness (SH-001)Forum | MIPs Portal"MIP40c3-SP67 updates the budget to expand the Strategic Happiness Core Unit, SH-001. It proposes an updated budget breakdown for DAI and MKR. In total, 770,000 DAI is requested (230,000 DAI up-front). Additionally, a 250 MKR vest is requested, streamed over 4 years with an 18-month cliff. A pro-rated offboarding term is also proposed for 2 months of funding if, after funding this Core Unit until March 15, 2023, the community decides not to renew a further budget."    High Go to Voting Page     Proposals in RFC     — RFC and FS Dates for reference and for existing proposals can be seen on this proposal tracker. If you have any questions about the voting process at MakerDAO, the Practical Guide to Voting will be useful.  There are currently seven active proposals in RFC. All seven are eligible to enter the upcoming June’s Governance Cycle.     Proposal Author      MIP4c2-SP15: Core Unit Offboarding Process Amendments"Recent events have shown the process for involuntarily offboarding facilitators and core units could be improved. These changes are an attempt to make the process more transparent, orderly, and conducive to substantive discussion surrounding an offboarding proposal prior to a vote."   @gfxlabs, with @twblack88 currently running point on it    MIP72: Delegated Collateral Attachment - RWA Arranger Application - 6s Capital"MIP72 authorizes 6s Capital as a Real World Asset Arranger for MakerDAO to cause commerce by assembling commercial senior-secured transactions based on the authorization #001 outlined herein."  @mrabino1    MIP4c2-SP20: MIP16 Amendments"MIP4c2-SP20 amends MIP16 to reflect the changes to the weekly Executive Vote cadence proposed by the Protocol Engineering Core Unit here."  @Patrick_J    MIP41c4-SP34: Immunefi Security Core Unit Facilitator Onboarding - IS-001"Add @psychonaut (Jpritikin Industries, Inc) as a co-Facilitator for Core Unit IS-001: Immunefi Security."  @psychonaut    MIP41c4-SP35: Facilitator Onboarding (DIN-001)“This subproposal adds @tadeo as the Facilitator for the Data Insights Core Unit.”  @tadeo    MIP41c5-SP6: Facilitator Offboarding (DIN-001)Note that this is a voluntary offboarding and will not be voted on.“This subproposal is to offboard the current Facilitator of the Data Insights Core Unit (DIN-001).”  @tmierzwa    MIP55c3-SP4: Adding a Special Purpose Fund - Makershire Hathaway"The Makershire Hathaway Special Purpose Fund will be a 10M pool managed by Strategic Finance CU under the supervision of Risk CU and prospective Lending Oversight CU to experiment with various yield generation strategies and support DAI liquidity/utility."  @aes         768×509 244 KB       “Let me in your windo~~~w”(Yes, I know I should have used this image one week ago)      Things to Come      The latest possible date for posting proposals* that will enter June’s Governace Cycle is Wednesday 11.  Ratification Polls will close in two weeks, on May 23. June’s Formal Submission Window opens on June 6.  * Monthly-cycle proposals with a four-week Feedback Period, that is—which make up the bulk of the most commonly submitted proposals.   oh btw For anything MIP-related: reach out to @gala, @sebix, or @blimpa!  Pre-MIP Discussions  Anti-inflationary Proposal Auction-backed DAI IAM for Surplus Buffer Proposal Ideas on the Forum [Pre-MIP] Using Gyroscope to cut through Dai’s Gordian knot: its USDC dependency An RWA style solution to replace the PSM
I’m a simple person: I see a Kate Bush meme, I comment, like and subscribe. (?)
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
